name: typesafe-vuex
description: A simple way to get static typing, static code analysis and intellisense with Vuex library - maintained fork of vuex-typescript
author: jackkoppa

scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf helpers && rimraf coverage
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint-force && npm run compile && node ./build/moveHelpers.js
scripts.build-watch: npm run clean && npm run lint-force && npm run compile-watch
scripts.coverage: rimraf coverage && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text --reporter=lcov -x **/*.spec.js npm run test-only
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
